long_description: With a comfortable padded seat and ample space for large kayakers, the Perception Tribe 11.5 Sit-On-Top Kayak offers fun and stability to ply your favorite waters. Versatile design performs well on flatwater and slow-moving rivers but don't hesitate to take the Tribe 11.5 into choppy water and light surf. Open cockpit is user-friendly for beginners, adjustable padded seat offers ventilation and drainage, and ergonomic footbraces make for easy riding. Skid plate on the bottom of the hull increases durability and prolongs life of kayak. Durable and lightweight linear polyethylene offers long-lasting use and easy care. Molded-in cup holder keeps a tasty beverage within easy reach. Storage tankwells with bungees secure your gear fore and aft. Scupper tubes located in the seat, rear tank well and foot area quickly drain any water that may enter the boat. Molded side handles and bow and stern carry handles ease transport to and from the water. Plenty of eyelets attach accessories to the Perception Tribe 11.5 Sit-On-Top Kayak.
short_description: With a comfortable padded seat and ample space for large kayakers, the Perception Tribe 11.5 Sit-On-Top Kayak offers fun and stability to ply your favorite waters.
